body: Follow-up story: 147408 It's a shame we only have these short stories. And come on guys, the story it's not that hard. The two are seeking chicks to hit on the beach, they see Riko-chan and Yuina, which is bathing. Then she opens up and MC enters. Later the other guy is having an orgy with Riko and her friends. Yuina is totally hooked up to MC, so she tells him to stay with her, and don't go with her other friends in the orgy. End. It's really simple, actually.
The translation is kinda trash, plot doesn't make much sense.
@chiII I will have you know i will never stop for anything on my journey to salvation.

@GreedsLove ahh I see. You're a man who wouldn't like their fap session ruined by some unnecessary weird orgy sex that makes your stomach turn after having a "sweet" hentai establishing the connection of the two MCs. You also seem to want to see these two in more stories developing a connection and a story were these two finnaly get married and end up growing old together with two kids and a dog. They shall be saved by my imagination of wholesomeness and no one can stop it from happening.
I need more of her... with him..
